mutants.mutated_line: if m < n and base < 2 and (base > 10):
mutants.code:
import math

def advanced_base_translation_avg(n, m, base):
    if m < n and base < 2 and (base > 10):
        return -1
    avg = math.ceil(sum(range(n, m + 1)) / (m - n + 1))
    digits = '0123456789ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ'
    converted = ''
    while avg > 0:
        (avg, idx) = divmod(avg, base)
        converted = digits[idx] + converted
    return converted

    converted = ''
    while avg > 0:
        (avg, idx) = divmod(avg, base)
        converted = digits[idx] + converted
    return converted

import math

def advanced_base_translation_avg(n, m, base):
    if m < n or base < 2 or base > 10:
        return -1
    avg = math.ceil(sum(range(n, m + -1)) / (m - n + 1))
    digits = '0123456789ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ'
    converted = ''
    while avg > 0:
        (avg, idx) = divmod(avg, base)
        converted = digits[idx] + converted
    return converted
